name: RunForYourLife
description:
The goal of this game is to get as far up as possible.

Aim with the mouse. charge up the jump by holding space and releasing.

left ctrl replaces jump with a jetpack for 5 seconds

holding shift will slow down time as long as you have enough charge

holding left button will grab walls and will cancel current momentum.. use this to your advantage!

replenish your supply of jetpacks and slowmotion with pickups

getting delay pickups will delay the wall of death

delay pickups will either pickup instantly when you can pay 10 coins or will pickup after 3 seconds in near proximity

good luck and have fun!

uses fonts made by kenney (https://opengameart.org/content/kenney-fonts)

uses NES Shooter Music made by SketchyLogic (https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles)
